pageContext.title: The Perfect Drift
pageContext.excerpt: With winter steelhead fishing upon us, I think about side drifting along the banks of my favorite coastal river, the Trinity River. All through these cold winter days, most of my time is spent fly fishing. I still look forward to my days spent gear fishing (fishing with conventional tackle) in search of winter chrome.â€¦ Read More »
